root.name: Frenzy
root.description: OverviewFrenzy was released in 1982 by Stern Electronics in the arcades and later ported to the ColecoVision and ZX Spectrum in 1983. While it wasn't as popular as its predecessor Berzerk, some consider Frenzy the better game because of its greater depth.The mazes are randomly generated, and many of the walls can be destroyed by shooting them.

similar_games.game: Escape from the Planet of the Robot Monsters
